headline.print_headline: Ad Industry Wrestling With Bias After a Suit
headline.main: Advertising Industry Wrestles With Bias After a Lawsuit

snippet: A conference in Miami aimed at charting the industry’s future was instead heavy with discussion about sexism in the workplace.
abstract: Advertising industry conference in South Beach, Fla, is dominated by discussion about scope of industry's problems with gender and racial diversity; discourse is prompted by suit accusing J Walter Thompson chief executive Gustavo Martinez of racist and sexist behavior.
